title: Xiaomi phones are also reportedly throttling performance for some applications and games
content:
Samsung has been embroiled in controversy over its Game Optimization Service, which quietly throttles the performance of around 10,000 applications. The discovery led to Geekbench pulling all benchmark results for all recent flagship Galaxy smartphones, and Samsung promising to release an update with a toggle for the functionality. Xiaomi has also used various performance tweaks

The post Xiaomi phones are also reportedly throttling performance for some applications and games appeared first on xda-developers.
description: New reports indicate at least some Xiaomi phones, including the Xiaomi 12 Pro and Mi 11, are intentionally slowing down some apps and games.
